channel.title: Comments on: First Day Activities: Robotics
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: matthewpmoran
item.dc:creator: matthewpmoran
item.description: I am stealing this for my first day with my science students. I only hope my students jump into a team-oriented process. I am really concerned with having that type of environment this year. I think I've neglected the need for team-building exercises in the past. Would love to hear more about how it goes for you.
item.content:encoded: I am stealing this for my first day with my science students. I only hope my students jump into a team-oriented process. I am really concerned with having that type of environment this year. I think I’ve neglected the need for team-building exercises in the past. Would love to hear more about how it goes for you.
